Posts.Content: Hi DianeH2016, I was in the clinical trial (phase 1) of GDC-0077 a pIK3ca inhibitor. It worked for me for 13 months. I had to be on the maximum dose of three diabetic drugs to keep my blood sugar in check. I lost 68 lbs. in one year and was most of the time in a fog. How are you doing?
Posts.Title: Alpelisib, PI3K
